original_text: I refused to take them there because they had not obeyed my laws and my commands. They did not obey my rules for Sabbath says. Instead, they liked to worship their idols.
korean_text: 그들이 마음으로 우상을 따라 나의 규례를 업신여기며 나의 율례를 행하지 아니하며 나의 안식일을 더럽혔음이라

sentences.original_text: I refused to take them there
because they had not obeyed my laws
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나의 법을 순종하지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: They did not obey my rules for Sabbath
Instead, they liked to worship their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 그들은 자신들의 우상을 숭배하는 것을 좋아했다
